(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): Additional path added after Base URL to access your Administrative Panel (e.g. admin, backend, control etc.).
(Zagotovite, da imate to na varnem mestu: Dodatna pot dodana osnovnemu URL za dostopanje do vaše administrativne plošče (npr. admin, backend, control itd.).

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): After successfull installation please click the button below.
(Zagotovite, da imate to na varnem mestu: Po uspešni namestitvi, kliknite gumb spodaj.

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): All packages were installed, click 'OK' to continue with installation.
(Zagotovite, da imate to na varnem mestu: Vsi paketi so bili nameščeni, kliknite 'OK', da nadaljujete z namestitvijo.

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): Alternatively you could try the 'Manual Downloads and Upgrades' method.
(Zagotovite, da imate to na varnem mestu: Alternativno lahko poskusite način 'Ročen prenos in posodobitev'.

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): Before you continue to your store, please make a note of your encryption key (Magento uses it to encrypt passwords, credit cards and more).
(Zagotovite, da imate to na varnem mestu: Preden nadaljujete v vašo trgovino, si zapišite vaš ključ enkripcije (Magento ga uporablja za enkripcijo gesel, kreditnih kartic in več).

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): Check this box only if it is not possible to automatically validate Secure URL, for example if HTTP authentication is required.
(Zagotovite, da imate to na varnem mestu: Označite to potrditveno polje samo, če ni mogoče avtomatsko preveriti varnega URL-ja, če je na primer zahtevano overjanje HTTP.

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): Check this box only if it is not possible to automatically validate the Base URL.
(Zagotovite, da imate to na varnem mestu: Označite to potrditveno polje samo, če ni možno avtomatično preveriti osnovnega URL-ja.

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): Choose this if you would like to test frontend and backend functionality.
(Zagotovite, da imate to na varnem mestu: Izberite to, če bi želeli testirati funcionalnost ospredja in ozadja.

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): Currently this is the most stable state available for Magento packages.
(Zagotovite, da imate to na varnem mestu: Trenutno je to najstabilnejše stanje na voljo za pakete Magento.
Ime podatkovne baze ne sme biti prazno.

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): Database server does not support the InnoDB storage engine.
(Zagotovite, da imate to na varnem mestu: Strežnik podatkovne baze ne podpira motorja shranjevanja InnoDB.

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): Download Magento Core Modules and Updates
(Zagotovite, da imate to na varnem mestu: Prenos modulov Magento jedra in posodobitve

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): Downloading and installing Magento, please wait...
Enable this option if you want the charts to be displayed on Dashboard.
(Zagotovite, da imate to na varnem mestu: Omogočite to možnost, če želite, da so grafikoni prikazani na kontrolni plošči.

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): Enable this option only if you have SSL available.
(Zagotovite, da imate to na varnem mestu: Omogočite to možnost samo, če imate na voljo SSL.

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): Get ready to experience Open-Source eCommerce Evolved.
(Zagotovite, da imate to na varnem mestu: Pripravite se za izkušnjo Open-Source eCommerce Evolved.

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): Help Us to Keep Magento Healthy
I agree to the above terms and conditions.
(Zagotovite, da imate to na varnem mestu: Strinjam se z zgornjimi pravili in pogoji.

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): If you are a developer and would like to have the latest public updates, choose this option.
(Zagotovite, da imate to na varnem mestu: Če ste razvijalec in bi želeli imeti zadnje javne posodobitve, izberite to možnost.

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): If you are running PHP as CGI, your PHP processes may run under the same user as the user you used when uploading Magento files.
(Zagotovite, da imate to na varnem mestu: Če poganjate PHP kot CGI, vaši procesi PHP lahko tečejo pod enakim uporabnikom, kot je uporabnik, ki ste ga uporabili, ko ste nalagali datoteke Magento.

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): If you are running the install wizard over a previously downloaded and installed Magento installation, proceed with this method.
(Zagotovite, da imate to na varnem mestu: Če poganjate namestitvenega čarovnika preko prej prenesene in nameščene namestitve Magento, nadaljujte s to metodo.

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): If you do not wish or are not able to have Magento folders writeable for the web process, you could use PEAR executable located in the root of Magento installation.
(Zagotovite, da imate to na varnem mestu: Če ne želite ali ne morete imeti direktorijev Magento zapisljivih za spletni proces, lahko uporabite PEAR izvršljivo datoteko locirano v vrhnjem direktoriju namestitve Magento.

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): If you have downloaded the full package or installed Magento through SVN, you should skip packages installation and validation by clicking the button below.
(Zagotovite, da imate to na varnem mestu: Če ste prenesli polni paket ali namestitev Magento preko SVN, bi morali preskočiti namestitev paketov in preverjanje s klikom na gumb spodaj.

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): If you wish to manage Magento packages through the web admin interface, you will need to have web writeable permissions applied to all Magento folders and files.
(Zagotovite, da imate to na varnem mestu: Če želite upravljati pakete Magento skozi spletni administracijski vmesnik, boste morali imeti spletno zapisljive pravice uporabljene na vseh mapah in datotekah Magento.

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): If your server is running on MS Windows, most probably you will not need to change anything.
(Zagotovite, da imate to na varnem mestu: Če se vaš strežnik poganja v MS Windows, zelo verjetno ne boste potrebovali narediti kakršnihkoli sprememb.

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): In other cases you will need to make Magento files writeable for the user that the web server process is running under.
(Zagotovite, da imate to na varnem mestu: V drugih primerih boste morali narediti datoteke Magento zapisljive za uporabnika, s katerim se procesirani spletni strežnik poganja.

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): Installer does not exist for %s database type
(Zagotovite, da imate to na varnem mestu: Za vrsto podatkovne baze %s namestitveni program ne obstaja

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): Magento is a trademark of Magento Inc. Copyright © %s Magento Inc.
(Zagotovite, da imate to na varnem mestu: Magento je blagovna znamka Magento Inc. Vse pravice pridržane © %s Magento Inc.

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): Magento uses this key to encrypt passwords, credit cards and more. If this field is left empty the system will create an encryption key for you and will display it on the next page.
(Zagotovite, da imate to na varnem mestu: Magento uporablja ta ključ za enkripcijo gesel, kreditnih kartic in več. Če to polje ostane prazno, bo sistem ustvaril ključ enkripcije za vas in ga bo prikazal na naslednji strani.
Ni vira za model podatkovne baze %s.

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): One of PHP Extensions "%s" must be loaded.
(Zagotovite, da imate to na varnem mestu: Ena izmed razširitev PHP "%s" mora biti naložena.

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): Please correct the user data and try again.
(Zagotovite, da imate to na varnem mestu: Popravite podatke uporabnika in poskusite ponovno.

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): Please make sure that mod_rewrite is enabled in Apache configuration.
(Zagotovite, da imate to na varnem mestu: Zagotovite, da je mod_rewrite omogočen v nastavitvah Apache.

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): Please note that it is much less stable than beta.
(Zagotovite, da imate to na varnem mestu: Upoštevajte, da je veliko manj stabilno kot beta.

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): Please note that only UNIX, Linux and Mac OS X shells are currently supported. For Windows use the '%s' option.
(Zagotovite, da imate to na varnem mestu: Upoštevajte, da so trenutno podprte samo lupine UNIX, Linux in Mac OS X. Za Windows uporabite možnost '%s'.

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): Please set all required settings before clicking Continue
(Zagotovite, da imate to na varnem mestu: Nastavite vse zahtevane nastavitve, preden kliknete nadaljevanje

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): Provide a complete base URL for SSL connection. For example: %s
(Zagotovite, da imate to na varnem mestu: Ponudite celotni osnovni URL za povezavo SSL. Na primer: %s

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): Run this in your shell from Magento root folder:
(Zagotovite, da imate to na varnem mestu: To poženite v vaši lupini iz vrhnjega direktorija Magento:

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): Skip Base URL Validation Before the Next Step
(Zagotovite, da imate to na varnem mestu: Pred naslednjim korakom preskoči preverjanje osnovnega URL-ja

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): Skip Secure URL validation before next step
(Zagotovite, da imate to na varnem mestu: Pred naslednjim korakom preskoči preverjanje varnega URL-ja

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): The database server version doesn\'t match system requirements (required: %s, actual: %s).
(Zagotovite, da imate to na varnem mestu: Verzija strežnika podatkovne baze se ne ujema z zahtevami sistema (zahtevano: %s, dejansko: %s).

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): The table prefix should contain only letters (a-z), numbers (0-9) or underscores (_), the first character should be a letter.
(Zagotovite, da imate to na varnem mestu: Predpona tabele bi morala vsebovati samo črke (a-z), številke (0-9) ali podčrtaje (_), prvi znak bi morala biti črka.

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): There was a problem installing Magento packages. Please read the log, correct errors and try again.
(Zagotovite, da imate to na varnem mestu: Pri nameščanju paketov Magento je prišlo do težave. Preberite dnevnik, popravite napake in poskusite ponovno.

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.):
You can specify server port, ex.: localhost:3307
If you are not using default UNIX socket, you can specify it here instead of host, ex.: /var/run/mysqld/mysqld.sock
(Zagotovite, da imate to na varnem mestu:
Določite lahko vrata strežnika, npr.: localhost:3307
Če ne uporabljate privzetega socket-a UNIX, ga lahko določite tu namesto gostitelja, npr.: /var/run/mysqld/mysqld.sock

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): You could enable this option to use web server rewrites functionality for improved search engines optimization.
(Zagotovite, da imate to na varnem mestu: To možnost lahko omogočite za uporabo prepisa funkcionalnosti spletnega strežnika za izboljšano optimizacijo iskalnikov.
